sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import $ from "jquery"; export default function ProspectoModal(props) { const [observaCount, setObservaCount] = useState(0); const handleChange = (e) => { console.log("Me cambiaste"); let estado = e.target.value; props.onChange; if (estado == "Rechazado" && observaCount < 1) { setObservaCount(observaCount + 1); $("#observaciones") .append("") .append( $("
